experience: You and Tehila Heather both know Ben Benedict, Siobhan Neilland, and 1 other
Body Foundations LLC, MaxForce Fitness LLC

Owned successful CrossFit gym  for 1.5 years and sold it in 2015. Performed physical assessments of athletes to define goals, meal plans, and feedback loops to meet athlete’s fitness goals. Maintained financial records, bookkeeping, product inventory, ordering, sales.  Developed training programs, led seminars, organized events and competitions.  Developed websites, managed social media, and designed t-shirts.  Trained and managed coaches. Currently coach and train private clients at home gym.

Data aggregation for clinical trials.  Build searches, visualizations, and user friendly dashboards for client with real time representation of lab and site specific results.  Wrote the user manual for the Power Analytics software and DASH Clinical.  Develop and implement the protocol for naming standards, change control, new client requirement specifications.  Create the system for quality control management both external and internal.  Engage stakeholders to meet the needs of the client.  Interface with software development and client to drive results to completion.  Manage quality control and assurance for data aggregation, change control, documentation, and client specific dashboards.

Process development and new technology exploration and development.  Define and implement process improvements and upgrades to increase product yield and process efficiency.  Research and design new technology systems from lab to skid to pilot to production.  Collect and analyze data from multiple sources to reveal the trends in the seasonal development of the guayule shrub.  Design experiments and perform trials to maximize the extraction process.  Provide knowledge and hands on experience with the market development of products.  Hands on installation and electrical wiring of equipment.

Support unit operations, business demands , quality assurance and quality control, process engineering.  Troubleshoot unit failures and upsets.  Design and maintain tools to monitor analytical data.  Manage quality alerts and customer corrective action plans.  Owner of Quality Control and Quality Assurance lab’s KPI program. Design and test new technologies on a lab scale.  Research and develop tools to improve chemical process.  Lead method development and improvement.

Led process chemistry and product quality assurance support to quality assurance lab, process engineering, logistics, supply, business.  Utilized strong research and analysis background in combination with problem solving strategies to deliver on-time high quality projects.  Supervised chemist intern.Recipient of 6 Shell Special Recognition Awards.  Improved catalyst quantization, method improvement and development, streamlined processes, created tools to track with the Japanese customer. Led Global Neodene Technical Method workshop and initiated the globalisation of Internal Olefin Methods
